title.title: Title
title.description: An optional title for the whole contracting process. If no process title is given, the tender, award or contract title field may be used in interfaces.

description.title: Description
description.description: An optional description for the whole contracting process. If no process description is given, the tender, award or contract description may be used in interfaces.

sector.title: Project sector
sector.description: A high-level categorisation of the main sector this procurement process relates to. This value should be taken from the the **PPP sector codelist**.

subSector.title: Project sub sector
subSector.description: A more detailed sectoral classification for this project. For example, if 'Tranport' is selected in the sector field, the sub-sector may be 'Airports'. There is no defined codelist for subsectors, to allow countries and reporting frameworks to define the detailed sectors that matter to them.
